actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize implementation of a project for the prevention of flood damage in Wyoming Valley, Luzerne County, Pennsylvania, for for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to implement the project for flood damage prevention at Wyoming Valley, Luzerne County, Pennsylvania. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize implementation of a project for the prevention of flood damage in Wyoming Valley, Luzerne County, Pennsylvania, for for other purposes.
